casebody.data:
IN RE: E.D. 125PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2018 Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, for E.D.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of June 2018 by Petitioner:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of June 2018."

Petitioner shall have up to and including the 8th day of August 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
